info.title: Navigate into an accordion panel in interaction mode

setupScript.name: setFocusOnFirstAccordionHeader
setupScript.description: sets focus on the 'Personal Information' accordion header
setupScript.source:
// sets focus on the 'Personal Information' accordion header
testPageDocument.getElementById('accordion1id').focus();

user: With focus on the 'Personal Information' accordion header, navigate into the accordion panel.
instructions.raw: With focus on the 'Personal Information' accordion header, navigate into the accordion panel.
instructions.mode: If NVDA did not make the focus mode sound when the test page loaded, press Insert+Space to turn focus mode on.

assertions.expectation: Name of region ('Personal Information') is conveyed
The ability to enter text into the input is conveyed
State of the input (required) is conveyed
